welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lawrenceville, a charming city known for its rich history and small-town charm. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal serves all commercial flights and has various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
